definition: to show understanding/to excuse/to presume/to expect
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate

sentences.english: You need a give-and-take attitude to get along in this firm.
sentences.chinese: 要想在這個公司和同事處好，你需採取諒互讓的態度。

sentences.english: I dare you to speak to my face.
I dare you to jump into the pool from the 5-meter-high platform.
sentences.chinese: 諒你也不敢從這個5米高的臺子上跳進水池裏去。

sentences.english: So, I responded very slowly, please forgive me.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我反應很慢，請見諒。

sentences.english: I may not be able to reply quickly, if so please forgive me.
sentences.chinese: 我也許不能很快作出回答，如果這樣請見諒。

sentences.english: Please be forgiven if there is any inconveniences occurred.
sentences.chinese: 若有任何不便之處，盡請見諒。

definition: to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
